name: VHSWare: e̷̘̜̎͜ṣ̴̺̔͜c̷̖͚̑̅a̸͚̘͛̀p̴̤͌e̴͇͖̽͊ it alone!
description:
Description

Digging in your attic, you discover an old console featuring a lot of familiar games! You don't recall what happens in those games, but you definitely want to play them. So, you prepare the console, and you are ready to play. But... the game just feels off, like if something was wrong with it...

And if that wasn't enough, the console is so old that sometimes it overloads and freezes.

In the console is included:

  • ń̶̡o̸̗̓t̴͇͠ḧ̴́ͅi̸̠̅n̶̺̾g̵̱̓
  • T̸̟͘͝Ų̸͕͑R̶̦͙͘N̸͚͓̝̿ ̸̞̉̽͠Ọ̴͖͔̉F̵̖̊̈́F̸̢̣̔ ̶̮̱̙̀̆Ť̶̙̹̋H̴̘͕̀Ę̵̢̖̇̍͠ ̴̳̌̕C̸̙̝͑͌O̸͙͋N̶̙̂͂͝S̸̥̗̽̔͠O̷͖̓̍̾͜L̶̻̅͂̕Ḛ̷̣͎͠
  • d̵̳̈ò̵̞̜͑̉n̶̛̯͍̠̎̎'̴̖̤̊̓͐t̵͉͇͇́̈́͛ ̶̢͈̞̆̋b̸͔͌u̸̖̯̙̿̆̀r̶̦̈́̉͝ǹ̸̪͈̔̐ ̵̥͍̓̚i̵̯̞͂̋̊t̴̹̝̀̌͊.̴̓̀͒

✶ Like we said early, you will DEFINITELY enjoy it!
